text: Anton Lehmden (2 January 1929 in Nitra, Slovakia â€“ 7 August 2018 in Vienna) was an Austrian painter, draughtsman, and printmaker. Lehmden was a co-founder of the Vienna School of Fantastic Realism. In 1948 he was represented in exhibitions of the Vienna Art-Club and has also been represented in many international exhibitions. Lehmden's work has been extensively exhibited in Italy, Austria, Japan, United States, Germany, Turkey and Poland.Biography on Austria Forum Lehmden died on 7 August 2018 in Vienna at the age of 89.Anton Lehmden verstorben ==References== ==Other websites== * Artcyclopedia entry * Schloss Deutschkreutz official web page * Anton Lehmden in Gallery 10 Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Austrian artists
title: Anton Lehmden
